thread.title: Bella Hadid steps out in Gigi's look during NYC sighting | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid steps out in Gigi's look during NYC sighting | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.Com
title: Bella Hadid steps out in Gigi's look during NYC sighting | Daily Mail Online
text: More sensible shoes: But instead of having on black pointy see-through short boots as Gigi did, Bella wore black Nike sneakers And instead of a black structured purse with gold hardware, the younger sister carried a rounded bag. Also different were the sunglasses: while Gigi wore dark shades, Bella's were orange. The two have had a lot in common. Skimpy: Bella's NYC sighting comes after she shared a very risque photo from LOVE magazine where she had on sheer pink undies Not only did both daughters of reality diva Yolanda Foster skyrocket to fame in the modeling world, but they have both had celebrity romances with singers. While Bella dated The Weeknd in 2016, Gigi was with One Direction vet Zayn Malik who has had an impressive solo career after delivering the hit Pillow Talk. They have also been featured on the cover of massive magazines (Gigi got Vogue, Bella has been on Elle) and major campaigns (Gigi is the face of Tommy Hilfiger and Bella is now representing DKNY). Both have modeled for Victoria's Secret. Bella's NYC sighting comes after she shared a very risque photo from LOVE magazine where she had on sheer pink undies. Good genes: All three of the Hadid kids - (L to R) Gigi, Anwar, Bella - are models Share or comment on this article 222
